title: Indian PE, VC investments decline 35 pc to USD 39 billion in 2023: Report
description: In 2023, Indian PE and VC investments declined by 35% to USD 39 billion. PE dropped by 18% to USD 29.6 billion, and VC saw a sharper decline. The report highlighted global investment trends and a surge in exit values.
